LanguageData.MousekinRace_Letter_AllegianceSysIntroDe:
By building a town square, you have now unlocked the Faction Allegiance system.

Once you have built up enough goodwill with certain factions, you can choose which faction to declare allegiance to and access various perks.

For more information, click on the Allegiance button in the bottom menu bar.
